name: eventcatalog
description: EventCatalog is a documentation platform for event-driven architectures. It inventories events, schemas, producers, and consumers in a browsable catalog so teams can understand and evolve event-based systems collaboratively.
features: Event Documentation: Catalog all events in your architecture. Complete event inventory.
Schema Management: Document event structures and formats. Clear data contracts.
Producer & Consumer Tracking: Map event flows through systems. Understand dependencies.
Browsable Catalog: Easy navigation of event-driven systems. Discover events quickly.
Team Collaboration: Shared understanding of event architecture. Aligned development.
Self-Hosted: Keep your architecture documentation private. Your events, your docs.
